//Change the background color of all elements with the class "[+TheNameOfTheClass+]".
var thecolor = "tomato";
const collection = document.getElementsByClassName("[+TheNameOfTheClass+]");
for (i=0; i<collection.length; i++) {
 	collection[i].style.backgroundColor = thecolor;
}

//Button: <button onclick="myFunction()">test</button>
//Function to change innerHTML to "Hello World" of all elements with the class "[+TheNameOfTheClass+]".
function myFunction() {
    var hw = "Hello World!"
    var x = document.getElementsByClassName("[+TheNameOfTheClass+]");
    for (i=0; i<x.length; i++) {
     	x[i].innerHTML = hw;
    }
